TopicTitle: Looking for a part (dock) from a mod.

Articles.Content:
Hello. 

I remember there was this part in one mod from 0.90, but I can not remember which one was it.

Basically Port Sr that can be "extended" (animation is it opens and a normal port pops up (like shielded, but a bit further), so now it can dock with normal port. When it is retracted it can dock with Sr.

Please point me to the mod or at least throw me a name.

> 
> Hello. 
> I remember there was this part in one mod from 0.90, but I can not remember which one was it.
> 
> Basically Port Sr that can be "extended" (animation is it opens and a normal port pops up (like shielded, but a bit further), so now it can dock with normal port. When it is retracted it can dock with Sr.
> 
> Please point me to the mod or at least throw me a name.

I think it is ven stock revamp... not sure..
That sounds very similar...was it part of a spaceplane pack? I think I have seen it somewhere.
Sounds like the J size clamp-o-tron from OPT Spaceplane

> 
> Sounds like the J size clamp-o-tron from OPT Spaceplane

I think that was it. Thank you !
